methods.void close(): Recycles the TypedArray, to be re-used by a later caller.
methods.boolean getBoolean(int index, boolean de: Retrieve the boolean value for the attribute at index.
methods.int getChangingConfigurations(): Return a mask of the configuration parameters for which the values in this typed array may change.
methods.int getColor(int index, int defValue): Retrieve the color value for the attribute at index.
methods.ColorStateList getColorStateList(int ind: Retrieve the ColorStateList for the attribute at index.
methods.float getDimension(int index, float defV: Retrieve a dimensional unit attribute at index.
methods.int getDimensionPixelOffset(int index, i: Retrieve a dimensional unit attribute at index for use as an offset in raw pixels.
methods.int getDimensionPixelSize(int index, int: Retrieve a dimensional unit attribute at index for use as a size in raw pixels.
methods.Drawable getDrawable(int index): Retrieve the Drawable for the attribute at index.
methods.float getFloat(int index, float defValue: Retrieve the float value for the attribute at index.
methods.Typeface getFont(int index): Retrieve the Typeface for the attribute at index.
methods.float getFraction(int index, int base, i: Retrieves a fractional unit attribute at index.
methods.int getIndex(int at): Returns an index in the array that has data.
methods.int getIndexCount(): Returns the number of indices in the array that actually have data.
methods.int getInt(int index, int defValue): Retrieve the integer value for the attribute at index.
methods.int getInteger(int index, int defValue): Retrieve the integer value for the attribute at index.
methods.int getLayoutDimension(int index, int de: Special version of getDimensionPixelSize(int, int) for retrieving ViewGroup's layout_width and layout_height attributes.
methods.int getLayoutDimension(int index, String: Special version of getDimensionPixelSize(int, int) for retrieving ViewGroup's layout_width and layout_height attributes.
methods.String getNonResourceString(int index): Retrieves the string value for the attribute at index, but only if that string comes from an immediate value in an XML file.
methods.String getPositionDescription(): Returns a message about the parser state suitable for printing error messages.
methods.int getResourceId(int index, int defValu: Retrieves the resource identifier for the attribute at index.
methods.Resources getResources(): Returns the Resources object this array was loaded from.
methods.int getSourceResourceId(int index, int d: Returns the resource ID of the style or layout against which the specified attribute was resolved, otherwise returns defValue.
methods.String getString(int index): Retrieves the string value for the attribute at index.
methods.CharSequence getText(int index): Retrieves the styled string value for the attribute at index.
methods.CharSequence[] getTextArray(int index): Retrieve the CharSequence[] for the attribute at index.
methods.int getType(int index): Returns the type of attribute at the specified index.
methods.boolean getValue(int index, TypedValue o: Retrieve the raw TypedValue for the attribute at index.
methods.boolean hasValue(int index): Determines whether there is an attribute at index.
methods.boolean hasValueOrEmpty(int index): Determines whether there is an attribute at index, returning true if the attribute was explicitly set to @empty and false only if the attribute was undefined.
methods.int length(): Returns the number of values in this array.
methods.TypedValue peekValue(int index): Retrieve the raw TypedValue for the attribute at index and return a temporary object holding its data.
methods.void recycle(): Recycles the TypedArray, to be re-used by a later caller.
methods.String toString(): Returns a string representation of the object.
